Package com.punchline.javalib.entities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component
    Base interface for components.
    EntityTemplate
    Base class for entity templates.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentManager
    Holds a map of Components with their type identifiers, and helpful methods for accessing and manipulating them.
    Entity
    A game entity that contains several Components which define its attributes.
    EntityGroupTemplate
    Base class for group templates.
    EntityManager
    Contains and organizes game Entities, sorting them according to tag, group, and type for easy access.
    EntitySystem
    Base class for all EntitySystems.
    EntityWorld  
    SystemManager
